motd:
This build brings some nice quality-of-life updates to usenet indexer search (with many more updates coming in the future).

You can now view the comments and download links in the expanded tile! Tapping the URL will open the URL, and long pressing the URL will copy it to your clipboard.

This build also improves the inkwell splashes across the UI, improves the UI when viewing rejection reasons for releases, merges Radarr's health check into the system status section, and fixes a few smaller bugs.

changes: Added a progress bar to better visualize disk usage
Show comment and download links in the expanded table
Ability to toggle off showing comment and download links
If a URL is in a table, tap it to open the URL or long press to copy the URL
Improve the layout of the rejection reasons dialog
Merged health check into system status
Added more descriptive tooltips to all popup menu buttons
Adjusted the style of splash/highlight inking
Images could fail to load with specific headers
An invalid total or free space value would cause a grey screen
Clear button for the search bar would not show up
